General.Name: HBR Realty Empreendimentos Imobiliários S.A
General.Description: HBR Realty Empreendimentos Imobiliários S.A. engages in the development, leasing, and management of commercial real estate properties in Brazil. It operates corporate buildings, convenience shopping centers, hotels, and parking lots, as well as provides self-storage units, built to suit, and sale lease back services. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Mogi das Cruzes, Brazil. HBR Realty Empreendimentos Imobiliários S.A. is a subsidiary of Helio Borenstein S.A. - Administração, Participações e Comércio.
General.Address: Av. Vereador Narciso Yague Guimarães, Mogi Das Cruzes, SP, Brazil, 08710-500
